info.name: nagytibor.xyz Gabe'n'Tibi
info.additionalInfo:
Requirements:
Extension: 
   Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/custom-style-script/ecjfaoeopefafjpdgnfcjnhinpbldjij
   Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/custom-style-script/
   Opera: https://addons.opera.com/en/extensions/details/custom-style-script/?display=en
Extension's script(Code section): https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/17111-nagytibor-xyz-gabe-n-tibi
Go to extension's settings and change about:blank to "http://nagytibor.xyz/" and copy script to textarea saying "Add JS code.". In the end click on the plus button to add the new rule
